application_process: Download the NTSE registration form from the official website or collect it from the liaison officer of your state
Fill in the form with accurate personal and academic details
Pay the application fee as specified by your state/UT
Submit the completed form along with required documents to the designated authority
selection_process: Stage 1: State-level examination comprising two parts:
Mental Ability Test (MAT): Assesses logical and analytical reasoning
Scholastic Aptitude Test (SAT): Evaluates knowledge in subjects like Science, Social Science, and Mathematics
Stage 2: National-level examination for candidates who qualify Stage 1
benefits: Scholarship: Financial assistance for higher studies in Science, Social Science, Engineering, Medicine, and Commerce up to doctoral level
Recognition: Prestigious award enhancing academic and professional opportunities
